column4: hello. when installing ubuntu, should i mark my / partition as bootable?
thx
yes
so i only need swap, and a / partition ?
gr8, thanks :)
i click on the synapitc package manager but it wont load any ideas?
synaptics*
doesn't it ask you for your password?
err no
i just listen to a sound and then nothing
moreover, i never got the change to set a root password (not that it is relevant)
strange...
in Ubuntu you don't have a root passwd... You get root privileges with sudo...
Have you set a password for root?
no
right
so i do everything by prepending sudo ?
yes
m, strange
or sudo -i if you want a root shell ....
try running sudo synaptic from a terminal...
i will thanks :)
